h1: EESIC - Engineering for Environmental Sustainability and International Cooperation

content.text: Take a few minutes to share your experience with the Project Results Platform.
You will help us make it even more valuable and inspiring for the education and learning community across Europe.
Take the survey (right-click to open in new tab)
Partnerships for cooperation and exchanges of practices
Results for this project are not yet available. They might become available after the project's end date.

You can reorder your projects by moving them up and down

content.title: Disclaimer
content.description: All content on the Erasmus+ Project Result Platform is provided as submitted by the (coordinating) beneficiary. The publication of projects and their results requires all users to respect theterms of useof the platform when uploading information.
